text: Zambia competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, United States. The nation won its first ever Olympic medal at these Games. ==Medalists== ===Bronze=== * Keith Mwila -- Boxing, Men's Light Flyweight ==Athletics== ;Men ;Track & road events {| class="wikitable"
